Subscription.Description: Monitors for account creation, deletion, modification, group membership changes, etc.
Subscription.Query: <QueryList><Query Id="0"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4624 or EventID=4625 or EventID=4720 or EventID=4722 or EventID=4723 or EventID=4724 or EventID=4725 or EventID=4726 or EventID=4727 or EventID=4730 or EventID=4731 or EventID=4738 or EventID=4732 or EventID=4733 or EventID=4756 or EventID=4757 or EventID=4728 or EventID=4729 or EventID=4764 or EventID=4767 or (EventID >= 5136 and EventID <= 5141) )]]</Select></Query></QueryList>
